arg.name: debug
arg.doc: Debug flag that will get passed on to ur_common.launch

arg.name: use_tool_communication
arg.doc: On e-Series robots tool communication can be enabled with this argument

arg.name: robot_ip
arg.doc: IP address by which the robot can be reached.

arg.name: started_controllers
arg.doc: position trajectory controllers that are loaded and started

arg.name: stopped_controllers
arg.doc: position trajectory controllers that are initally loaded, but not started

arg.name: controllers
arg.doc: Controllers that are activated by default.

arg.name: controller_config_file
arg.doc: Config file used for defining the ROS-Control controllers.

arg.name: headless_mode
arg.doc: Automatically send URScript to robot to execute. On e-Series this does require the robot to be in 'remote-control' mode. With this, the URCap is not needed on the robot.

arg.name: kinematics_config
arg.doc: Kinematics config file used for calibration correction. This will be used to verify the robot's calibration is matching the robot_description.

arg.name: tool_voltage
arg.doc: Tool voltage set at the beginning of the UR program. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_parity
arg.doc: Parity configuration used for tool communication. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_baud_rate
arg.doc: Baud rate used for tool communication. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_stop_bits
arg.doc: Number of stop bits used for tool communication. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_rx_idle_chars
arg.doc: Number of idle chars in RX channel used for tool communication. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_tx_idle_chars
arg.doc: Number of idle chars in TX channel used for tool communication. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_device_name
arg.doc: Local device name used for tool communication. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.

arg.name: tool_tcp_port
arg.doc: Port on which the robot controller publishes the tool comm interface. Only used, when `use_tool_communication` is set to true.
